name: "IT Specialist", LLC
description:
Our company unites cybersecurity experts to deliver our clients managed cybersecurity services, perform audit and implement security products.
We have white-hacking team that focus on penetration testing.
Сertified information security specialists: CISSP, CISA, CISM, CEH, eJPT, eCPPT, OSCP.
Our services and competencies are especially valuable to the companies, which care for its clients’ data and privacy protection, and for which it is important that the company business processes, business applications and all IT systems operate without a failure, quickly and efficiently.
